list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a long curved fruit which grows in clusters and has soft pulpy flesh and yellow skin when ripe.
the tropical and subtropical palmlike plant that bears bananas, having very large leaves but lacking a woody trunk.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I've spent two months in a studio—I must be bananas
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã dành hai tháng trong một studio-Tôi phải là chuối
